posts.name: Salt
posts.cooked:
This thread will serve as a place to merge discussions about Signal for Android availability from various sources (Google Play, Firebase, Web APK, APK Mirror, etc.).

FAQ section coming soon.

posts.name: Anon
posts.cooked:
Still same version. 7.8.0. STILL didn‚Äôt come out for me on Play Store.

I didn‚Äôt get any notifications from Signal.

I just opened app to send a message to someone and THEN I received like 5 different notifications for missed calls and messages.

This is when ‚ÄúDo not disturb‚Äù mode is been disabled and when It is enabled and disabled.

Log

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.8 release

posts.name: üëäüá∫üá∏üî•
posts.cooked:
Anon76:

Still same version. 7.8.0. STILL didn‚Äôt come out for me on Play Store.

This is an ongoing Google problem. They‚Äôre slow to approve it. The way to avoid this problem is:

Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.8 release

If you‚Äôd like to get releases even faster, consider signing up through Firebase App Delivery, where the release is available immediately.

If there are seats left.

Anon76:

I just opened app to send a message to someone and THEN I received like 5 different notifications for missed calls and messages.

This is when ‚ÄúDo not disturb‚Äù mode is been disabled and when It is enabled and disabled.

This is also an ongoing problem with aggressive OEM battery optimization settings. It doesn‚Äôt only impact Signal. Go to https://dontkillmyapp.com/ and follow the relevant guidance.

posts.name: Anon
posts.cooked:
I don‚Äôt want to download Signal outside Play Store. I am worried about chat backup etc.

Also I just missed 2 calls and messages AGAIN. And when I sent message to a group of 3 people, message was very slowly delivered despite having 100Mbps internet connection. I am not sure if there is problem with the server in my region (Serbia) but Signal is behaving very strangely today and yesterday.

I have put Signal to ‚Äúapps that won‚Äôt automatically be put to sleep‚Äù list in Samsung settings and restarted my phone twice today and cleared cache and RAM just to make everything optimal.

I didn‚Äôt have problems with other apps.

Any predictions when Signal 7.8.0 (or 7.8.1) will be available on Play Store for Beta users? It‚Äôs been almost 3 days!

Firebase is sometimes risky and is full.

posts.name: üëäüá∫üá∏üî•
posts.cooked:
Anon76:

Any predictions when Signal 7.8.0 (or 7.8.1) will be available on Play Store for Beta users? It‚Äôs been almost 3 days!

It‚Äôs dependent on Google. The best the devs could say (I think) is what stage the review is at.

Anon76:

Any predictions when Signal 7.8.0

Well they did say .0 releases arent going to be published on Google Play. Although I dont know if it has changed.

Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 6.17 release

Please note, .0 beta releases will not be published on Google Play going forward. Think of them as a ‚Äúcanary‚Äù build where we can get to a bunch of immediate issues, and then publish a follow-up .1 build the next day which we‚Äôll put on both firebase and the play store.

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 6.17 release

posts.name: Talya (she/her)
posts.cooked:
np4gr:

Although I dont know if it has changed.

I think it has, though it‚Äôs still up to Google to decide and occasionally builds may be delayed by Google so much to the point a new version is available before the old one is cleared through.
edit: or maybe just a couple of .0 releases got pushed to Play Store by mistake, I actually have no idea. I think I only upgraded to .0 via Play Store once.

posts.name: Anon
posts.cooked:
np4gr:

Well they did say .0 releases arent going to be published on Google Play. Although I dont know if it has changed.

I received couple Beta updates from play Store that were .0

Also version 7.8.1 was released the same day if I am not mistaken as 7.8.0 so the same question still remains. I didn‚Äôt receive 7.8.0 nor 7.8.1 and today is Monday!

I am waiting for a whole week for Beta update on Google Play!

It used to be slow, then they fixed it to be released the same day just 8-20 hours from Firebase but now again I am waiting for DAYS for a small update.

And main problem is that 7.7.1 is broken! I don‚Äôt get notifications and I have missed calls. So for me 7.8.x is critically important ASAP.

posts.name: anon53652
posts.cooked:
Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.8 release

And main problem is that 7.7.1 is broken!

Anon76:

I don‚Äôt want to download Signal outside Play Store.

Well that problem is your own doing then. If the apk from apkmirror would be signed with a different key it would not install (unless you hacked that functionality out of your phone firmware but then you knew what you were doing).

If someone else is able to sign a Signal apk with the original key there is a bigger problem.

posts.name: sigfun
posts.cooked: Is it possible to keep the APK in Signal >> Signal Android APK up to date alongside the beta version as not to depend on Google whims and bureaucracy?

posts.name: üëäüá∫üá∏üî•
posts.cooked: That APK is always the stable version. You can get the beta APKs from apkmirror when Google takes too long.

posts.name: Clayton Burns
posts.cooked:
I‚Äôm usually the uploader to APKMirror. I download from Firebase as soon as I get the email that a new version is available, and then upload as soon as it finishes installing. APKMirror does have a review process, so it could take an hour for it to show up.

An easy way to automatically download and install updates from APKMirror is to use APKUpdater. Might get you on the latest beta faster than the play store.

link_counts.title: GitHub - rumboalla/apkupdater: APKUpdater is an open source tool that simplifies the process of finding updates for your installed apps.

posts.name: adarsh
posts.cooked:
Hi,

I didn‚Äôt receive any update on Play Store, so I decided to join the FAD and update to the latest beta. I am currently on 7.7.1. During my attempt to download version 7.8.1 (142100), after I hit Update on the package installer, the update abruptly stops and crashes. The same happens even for version 142000.

This is only happening with Signal since I tried updating other apps with APK / package installer and things work fine. Kindly look into it.
